Class Partida

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Partida
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Partida
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Classe partida del Model del Client. Gestiona les serps de la partida i comprova que no hi hagi colisions. Created by Grup 6 on 06/04/2017.
